<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pirouette](/Feats.aspx?ID=4045) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 126</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Masquerade of Seasons Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=4044)

**Trigger**
An enemy targets you with a Strike.

**Requirements**
You're in Masquerade of Seasons Stance.

</column>

---

You twirl gracefully, spinning on one foot to evade your opponent's attack. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses you, you can immediately Step. If the attack hits you anyway, reduce the damage it deals by an amount equal to half your level; this reduction in damage is applied after calculating immunities, resistances, and weakness.
name: Pirouette
requirement: You're in Masquerade of Seasons Stance.
